API Reference¶

Classes¶

kineticstoolkit.timeseries.TimeSeries([…])

A class that implements TimeSeries.

kineticstoolkit.timeseries.TimeSeriesEvent([…])

Define an event in a timeseries.

kineticstoolkit.player.Player(*ts[, …])

A class that allows visualizing markers and rigid bodies in 3D.

kineticstoolkit.dbinterface.DBInterface(…)

Interface for Felix Chenier’s BIOMEC database.

Modules¶

kineticstoolkit.config

Provide configuration values for Kinetics Toolkit’s inner working.

kineticstoolkit.cycles

Identify cycles and time-normalize data.

kineticstoolkit.dev

Provide fonctions related to development, tests and release of Kinetics Toolkit.

kineticstoolkit.emg

Provide some tools to analyze EMG.

kineticstoolkit.filters

Provide standard filters for TimeSeries.

kineticstoolkit.geometry

Provide 3d geometry and linear algebra functions related to biomechanics.

kineticstoolkit.gui

Provide simple GUI functions.

kineticstoolkit.inversedynamics

Provide functions to calculate inverse dynamics.

kineticstoolkit.kinematics

Provide functions related to kinematics analysis.

kineticstoolkit.loadsave

Provide functions to load and save data.

kineticstoolkit.pushrimkinetics

Provide functions to process kinetic data from instrumented wheelchair wheels.

kineticstoolkit.tools

Provide miscelleanous helper functions to the user.
